analysis.name: SOLIDITY_VISIBILITY
analysis.content: functionChineseCookies(){bakeCookie("A friend asks only for your time not your money.");bakeCookie("If you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.");bakeCookie("A smile is your passport into the hearts of others.");bakeCookie("A good way to keep healthy is to eat more Chinese food.");bakeCookie("Your high-minded principles spell success.");bakeCookie("Hard work pays off in the future, laziness pays off now.");bakeCookie("Change can hurt, but it leads a path to something better.");bakeCookie("Enjoy the good luck a companion brings you.");bakeCookie("People are naturally attracted to you.");bakeCookie("A chance meeting opens new doors to success and friendship.");bakeCookie("You learn from your mistakes... You will learn a lot today.");}
